testcase.name: Build output — Cloudflare Pages structure > dist/ directory exists
Build output — Cloudflare Pages structure > _worker.js/ directory exists (Cloudflare Workers entrypoint)
Build output — Cloudflare Pages structure > _worker.js/index.js exists (main worker script)
Build output — Cloudflare Pages structure > _routes.json exists (Cloudflare Pages routing)
Build output — Cloudflare Pages structure > _routes.json has valid structure
Build output — Cloudflare Pages structure > _routes.json excludes static assets from worker
Build output — Cloudflare Pages structure > _astro/ directory exists (client-side bundles)
Build output — Cloudflare Pages structure > _astro/ contains hashed JS bundles
Build output — Cloudflare Pages structure > prerendered static pages exist as HTML
Build output — Cloudflare Pages structure > _headers file exists (Cloudflare custom headers)
SSR Worker Smoke Tests (Miniflare) > worker responds to GET / without crashing
SSR Worker Smoke Tests (Miniflare) > GET / returns status 200
SSR Worker Smoke Tests (Miniflare) > GET / returns text/html content-type
SSR Worker Smoke Tests (Miniflare) > GET / returns valid HTML, not [object Object]
SSR Worker Smoke Tests (Miniflare) > GET / HTML body is non-trivially sized (> 500 bytes)
SSR Worker Smoke Tests (Miniflare) > GET / HTML contains <head> and <body> structure
SSR Worker Smoke Tests (Miniflare) > GET /nonexistent-route does not crash the worker
SSR Worker Smoke Tests (Miniflare) > dynamic route with mocked Sanity data returns HTML
SSR Worker Smoke Tests (Miniflare) > concurrent requests all complete without server errors
SSR Worker Smoke Tests (Miniflare) > no response body contains raw [object Object]
Wrangler config — root wrangler.toml > exists at project root
Wrangler config — root wrangler.toml > has required name field
Wrangler config — root wrangler.toml > points pages_build_output_dir to astro-app/dist
Wrangler config — root wrangler.toml > has a compatibility_date
Wrangler config — root wrangler.toml > has nodejs_compat flag enabled
Wrangler config — astro-app/wrangler.jsonc > exists in astro-app
Wrangler config — astro-app/wrangler.jsonc > has matching name with root config
Wrangler config — astro-app/wrangler.jsonc > has matching compatibility_date with root config
Wrangler config — astro-app/wrangler.jsonc > has matching compatibility_flags with root config
Wrangler config — astro-app/wrangler.jsonc > pages_build_output_dir points to ./dist
Wrangler config — consistency > root output dir resolves to same location as app output dir
Mock data — structural validation > 'sponsors' page has required top-level fields
Mock data — structural validation > 'about' page has required top-level fields
Mock data — structural validation > 'projects' page has required top-level fields
Mock data — structural validation > 'contact' page has required top-level fields
Mock data — structural validation > 'sponsors' page blocks all have _type and _key
Mock data — structural validation > 'about' page blocks all have _type and _key
Mock data — structural validation > 'projects' page blocks all have _type and _key
Mock data — structural validation > 'contact' page blocks all have _type and _key
Mock data — structural validation > 'sponsors' page block _keys are unique
Mock data — structural validation > 'about' page block _keys are unique
Mock data — structural validation > 'projects' page block _keys are unique
Mock data — structural validation > 'contact' page block _keys are unique
Mock data — structural validation > sponsors page contains sponsorCards or sponsorSteps block
Mock data — structural validation > contact page contains contactForm block
GROQ query definitions > SITE_SETTINGS_QUERY is a non-empty string
GROQ query definitions > ALL_PAGE_SLUGS_QUERY targets page type with slug projection
GROQ query definitions > PAGE_BY_SLUG_QUERY includes all block type projections
GROQ query definitions > PAGE_BY_SLUG_QUERY uses $slug parameter
loadQuery() > calls sanityClient.fetch with query and params
loadQuery() > defaults params to empty object when not provided
loadQuery() > uses published perspective when visual editing is disabled
getSiteSettings() > throws when no siteSettings document exists
getSiteSettings() > returns site settings when document exists
cn() — class name utility > merges simple class strings
cn() — class name utility > resolves Tailwind conflicts (last wins)
cn() — class name utility > handles conditional classes via clsx
cn() — class name utility > handles undefined and null inputs
cn() — class name utility > handles empty string inputs
cn() — class name utility > handles array inputs
cn() — class name utility > handles object inputs (truthy keys)
cn() — class name utility > returns empty string for no valid inputs
cn() — class name utility > merges complex Tailwind utility conflicts
Carousel logic > carousel DOM has correct initial state
Carousel logic > goToSlide logic transitions state correctly
Carousel logic > nextSlide wraps around correctly
Contact form logic > form DOM structure is correct
Contact form logic > submit button can be programmatically disabled
Contact form logic > form state can be set to success
Scroll animation logic > IntersectionObserver is NOT natively available in jsdom (requires polyfill in real app)
Scroll animation logic > data-animate elements can receive animate-visible class
